title: start
author: Kevin Long
onenter: Welcome to this online interactive text based adventure. Throughout this adventure you will solve puzzles, explore storylines, and much more! Each level you will be prompted with a question, most questions have multiple answers. The questions range from puzzles with one correct answer to more open ended questions with many correct answers. We will start off simple with some multiple choice:
prompt: "What is the answer to this question?" "42", "no", or "maybe".

options.no: Why would the answer be no? Try a quick Google search for the answer to life the universe and everything.
options.maybe: Maybe, maybe what? Always be sure of your answers, be confident in yourself!
